snippet: The retailer said the sudden resignation of its chief executive officer, Brian J. Dunn, would not stop an inquiry into what it called personal conduct issues.
abstract: Best Buy says the sudden resignation of its chief executive officer Brian J Dunn will not not stop an inquiry into what it calls personal conduct issues; does not disclose details of what the conduct in question was.
lead_paragraph: The retailer said the sudden resignation of its chief executive officer, Brian J. Dunn, would not stop an inquiry into what it called personal conduct issues.

headline.seo: Best Buy Inquiry Continues Into Behavior of C.E.O., Brian Dunn
headline.main: Best Buy Inquiry Into Chief’s Behavior Will Continue
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Inquiry Into Chief’s Behavior Will Continue
